resources.string: This application will save the logs, compress them, and let you upload them easily.
Text to append to file name
Notes to include in the zip file
Warning: No root access. Logs may be incomplete or missing.
Warning: No root access. Without root, it is not possible to get system or modem logs, and with some 3.x kernels it also may not be able to get kernel logs.
Error saving logs. Check your SD card.

This is a simple application that takes the system logs via dmesg and logcat, and saves them to the primary external storage under SysLog/<Date-Time>, compresses them, and lets you upload/email them. 
Root access is required for 4.1+ to access the full logs, and in some cases for kernel logs. 



 This app is open source, and licensed under the GPL, version 2. You can view the source at http://github.com/Tortel/Syslog 

 This app uses libsuperuser, by Jorrit 'Chainfire' Jongma, licensed under the Apache License, Version 2, available at http://github.com/Chainfire/libsuperuser
